title: Artist Profile: Tanya Harris
body:
Using sound recordings made in four churches designed by the architect Nicholas Hawksmoor- Tanya Harris translated the vibration of the sound into physical form, putting water in a loud speaker, capturing the geometric shapes created and engraving them on stone.

“Architecture as frozen music and music is liquid architecture.”

See Tanya’s beautiful photographs and stone work closer on her [site](http://www.tanyaharris.co.uk/)
